name: Running Zombie War: Killing Dead - by Fun Games For Free
name_original: Running Zombie War: Killing Dead - by Fun Games For Free
description:
RUN for your life! Escape the zombies and Kill as many as you can!

Release you Zombie Killing instinct in this non-stop action Runner game!

Features:
- Several types of Guns
- Swipe to move and tap to shoot!
- Massive zombie Kills
- Amazing power-ups
- Crazy scenarios

Enjoy while it's FREE!
